name: .RLI File Extension
summary: Learn about .RLI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image file created by RealWorld Graphics software products such as RealWorld Icon Editor, RealWorld Cursor Editor, RealWorld Photos, or RealWorld Paint; supports mulitiple independent editing layers as well as both vector and raster graphics; can be saved as a standard .PNG, .JPG, or .GIF file; can also be used for making Windows icons and cursors.

content: NOTE: Since the RLI format has been updated with new versions of the software, RLI files created with one version of the software may not be compatible with older software versions.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
